Generation VI.X: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
Generation VI.Y: The beaks of bird Pokémon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: The beaks of bird Pokémon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.

Generation IX.Scarlet: If Rufflet attacks this Pokémon by pecking at it, it will retaliate with its sharp fur and poisonous black powder.
Generation IX.Violet: Spewpa doesn't live in a fixed location. It roams where it pleases across the fields and mountains, building up the energy it needs to evolve.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Four
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Four
